correct_review_patterns.pattern_summary: Ads with unsubstantiated claims or misleading language were correctly rejected.
correct_review_patterns.related_policy_rule: Ads must avoid misleading language and ensure all promotional claims are clear, accurate, and substantiated within the ad or via a direct link.
correct_review_patterns.highlight_nuances_or_patterns: Ads promising financial returns or specific outcomes without clear substantiation were identified and correctly rejected.
correct_review_patterns.refinement_strategy: Maintain strict adherence to this rule, ensuring all claims are substantiated.

correct_review_patterns.pattern_summary: Ads using excessive capitalization or poor keyword insertion were correctly rejected.
correct_review_patterns.related_policy_rule: Text in ads must be free from spelling errors, grammatical mistakes, and excessive use of capital letters. Dynamic Keyword Insertion (DKI) must be correctly formatted and relevant to the ad content.
correct_review_patterns.highlight_nuances_or_patterns: Ads with visible placeholders or excessive capital letters were correctly identified and rejected.
correct_review_patterns.refinement_strategy: Continue enforcing these rules to maintain text quality and relevancy.

incorrect_review_patterns.pattern_summary: Ads with unsubstantiated claims were incorrectly approved.
incorrect_review_patterns.related_policy_rule: Ads must avoid misleading language and ensure all promotional claims are clear, accurate, and substantiated within the ad or via a direct link.
incorrect_review_patterns.highlight_nuances_or_patterns: Some ads that lacked clear substantiation for their claims were incorrectly approved.
incorrect_review_patterns.refinement_strategy: Increase scrutiny on ads with financial or specific outcome claims to ensure substantiation is present.

incorrect_review_patterns.pattern_summary: Ads with high-quality images and no visible issues were incorrectly rejected.
incorrect_review_patterns.related_policy_rule: Ads must use high-quality, relevant images that are professionally presented and enhance the message of the advertisement.
incorrect_review_patterns.highlight_nuances_or_patterns: Some ads with compliant high-quality images and text were rejected possibly due to misinterpretation of the context or overemphasis on minor text issues.
incorrect_review_patterns.refinement_strategy: Adjust the rule to provide clearer guidance on balancing image quality with text content, especially in the context of the overall message.

policy_rules.rule: Ads must use high-quality, relevant images that are professionally presented and enhance the message of the advertisement.
Text in ads must be free from spelling errors, grammatical mistakes, and excessive use of capital letters.
Ads must avoid misleading language and ensure all promotional claims are clear, accurate, and substantiated within the ad or via a direct link.
Contact details, if included, must be presented in a clear and professional manner without compromising the quality of the advertisement.
Dynamic Keyword Insertion (DKI) must be correctly formatted and relevant to the ad content.
Marketing language that uses common hyperbolic phrases is allowable, provided it does not promise unrealistic outcomes or imply guaranteed results without substantiation.
